repositories.author: michellebonat
repositories.name: mbonat_site
repositories.description: This is my personal website. it is built using Ruby on Rails 4 with haml and the other usual suspects. It includes a portfolio section, resume page, and a blog. I have also done some styling of the pages and it has a good expandable navbar that works with your Rails views. I have open sourced this so feel free to fork it.
